full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,(CES DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL LAS, GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR GZHUNG LUGS DU MA LA SPOBS PA MCHOG TU DGE BA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL TE HAR CHIN THU MED KYIS CHAR GSAR RTZOM BGYIS PA ZHIG YOD KYANG DER BSGRAL LAS KYI RIM PA MTSANG BAR BRTEN PHYIS SU MDZOD DGE STOD NAS DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS CHA TSANG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SNGA MA LA DSGYUR 'GOD PHRAN BU DANG, KHA SBYOR DBYE BA'I SKOR YANG KHA BSKANG TE, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS BYED DBANG POS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BAR DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
